verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:9
verses.text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you, for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God;

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:10
verses.text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face, and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith?

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:11
verses.text: Now God himself and our Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way unto you.

verses.name: 1 Thessalonians 3:12
verses.text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all men, even as we do toward you:
